PerfectNetExp.abs: 桑拿（sauna）（Sauna），又称芬兰浴，是指在封闭房间内用蒸气对人体进行理疗的过程。通常桑拿（sauna）室内温度可以达到90℃以上。

entry.def: If you have a sauna, you sit or lie in a room that is so hot that it makes you sweat. People have saunas in order to relax and to clean their skin thoroughly.
A sauna is a room or building where you can have a sauna.

means.word_mean: 1. a Finnish steam bath; steam is produced by pouring water over heated rocks
